title: Raani Haar: The Polki Diamond Grandeur

features: This Raani Haar features a graduating floral motif design, intricately set with uncut Polki diamonds. The necklace is designed to sit elegantly on the collarbone, showcasing the brilliance of the diamonds. It includes cascading diamond drops for added movement and sparkle. The central pendant adds a focal point, echoing the floral theme with a larger, more elaborate design. The setting is crafted using traditional Kundan techniques, ensuring each diamond is securely and beautifully displayed.

description: This exquisite Raani Haar is a timeless heirloom, handcrafted by master artisans in Hyderabad. It combines traditional techniques with exceptional quality materials, resulting in a piece that is both culturally significant and breathtakingly beautiful. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique character and unmatched sparkle. Its sturdy construction ensures years of enjoyment, making it a true investment piece.
